greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=a(2)=1, a(1)=2, a(n)=0 for n>2.
comment: Self-convolution of A019590. Up to a sign the convolutional inverse of the natural numbers sequence. - _Tanya Khovanova_, Jul 14 2007
formula: a(n) = binomial(2n, n^2). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Mar 08 2014
maple: A130713:=n->binomial(2*n, n^2); seq(A130713(n), n=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Mar 08 2014
mathematica: Table[Binomial[2 n, n^2], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Mar 08 2014 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_ and _Tanya Khovanova_, Jul 01 2007
